price: 169. Nabii Luut isi Rabbi kallacak:yi- Rabbow yoo kee yi-buxah marak yol teemeneemiiy keenik kalah yol yeemene mara, yi-mari aba uma taamaa kee keenil ob tu way ta digaalák nee naggos iyye.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
